revised_title: Tidal Friction in the Irish Sea: Energy Dissipation and Friction Mechanisms
topics: Friction on the Bed of Rivers
tldr: The authors investigate the dissipation of energy in tidal currents in the Irish Sea, focusing on the frictional forces at play. They compare the friction of the sea on its bottom to the friction of the wind on the ground and develop a formula to estimate the energy dissipated by tidal friction. The study provides a more accurate estimate of energy dissipation than previous methods, taking into account the varying nature of the sea's bottom and the effects of scale on friction.
